translations: 反刍动物；沉思默想的人
反刍动物的；沉思默想的

sentences.sentence: When food is in short supply, a ruminant can last longer than a nonruminant because it can derive more energy out of the same food.
sentences.translation: 当食物短缺时，反刍动物比非反刍动物寿命更长，因为反刍动物可以从同样的食物中获得更多的能量。

sentences.sentence: The products of ruminant feed and cattle or sheep-derived feed from the enterprises and farms of 7 districts in Shaanxi province were detected by real-time PCR.
sentences.translation: 实时PCR对陕西省7个地市生产、经营和使用的反刍动物饲料产品和动物源性饲料产品（原料）进行了牛羊源成分检测调查。

sentences.sentence: Effects of dietary fiber on intestinal mucosal morphology and epithelial cell turnover, mechanisms and digestive functions in non-ruminant animals were reviewed.
sentences.translation: 本文综述了日粮纤维对非反刍动物肠黏膜形态和上皮细胞更新的影响及其作用机理和对动物消化功能的影响。
